00028    /* 
00029    * Constructor.
00030    */
00031    McPairEnergyAverage::McPairEnergyAverage(McSystem& system)
00032     : SystemDiagnostic<McSystem>(system),
00033       outputFile_(),
00034       accumulator_(),
00035       nSamplePerBlock_(1),
00036       isInitialized_(false)
00037    {
00038       selector_.setAvoidDoubleCounting(true); 
00039    }
00040 
00041 
00042    /*
00043    * Read parameters and initialize.
00044    */
00045    void McPairEnergyAverage::readParam(std::istream& in)
00046    {
00047 
00048       readInterval(in);
00049       readOutputFileName(in);
00050       read<int>(in,"nSamplePerBlock", nSamplePerBlock_);
00051       read<PairSelector>(in,"selector", selector_);
00052 
00053       accumulator_.setNSamplePerBlock(nSamplePerBlock_);
00054 
00055       // If nSamplePerBlock != 0, open an output file for block averages.
00056       if (nSamplePerBlock_) {
00057          fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".dat"), outputFile_);
00058       }
00059 
00060       isInitialized_ = true;
00061    }
00062 
00063    /*
00064    * Clear accumulator.
00065    */
00066    void McPairEnergyAverage::setup() 
00067    {  accumulator_.clear(); }
00068  
00069    /*
00070    * Evaluate energy per particle, and add to ensemble. 
00071    */
00072    void McPairEnergyAverage::sample(long iStep) 
00073    {
00074 
00075       if (!isAtInterval(iStep)) return;
00076 
00077       Atom  *iAtomPtr, *jAtomPtr;
00078       int    nNeighbor, nInCell;
00079       int    ic, nc, i, j, iId, jId, iType, jType;
00080       double energy;
00081       double rsq;
00082 
00083       // Loop over cells
00084       energy = 0.0;
00085       nc = system().pairPotential().cellList().totCells();
00086       for (ic = 0; ic < nc; ++ic) {
00087 
00088          // Get array of neighbors_
00089          system().pairPotential().cellList().getCellNeighbors(ic, neighbors_, nInCell);
00090          nNeighbor = neighbors_.size();
00091   
00092          // Loop over primary atoms in this cell
00093          for (i = 0; i < nInCell; ++i) {
00094             iAtomPtr = neighbors_[i];
00095             iId      = iAtomPtr->id();
00096             iType    = iAtomPtr->typeId();
00097           
00098             // Loop over secondary atoms in this and neighboring cells
00099             for (j = 0; j < nNeighbor; ++j) {
00100                jAtomPtr = neighbors_[j];
00101                jId      = jAtomPtr->id();
00102                jType    = jAtomPtr->typeId();
00103      
00104                if (selector_.match(*iAtomPtr, *jAtomPtr)) {
00105 
00106                   // Exclude masked pairs
00107                   if (!iAtomPtr->mask().isMasked(*jAtomPtr)) {
00108 
00109                      rsq = system().boundary().
00110                            distanceSq(iAtomPtr->position(), jAtomPtr->position());
00111                      energy += system().pairPotential().
00112                                energy(rsq, iAtomPtr->typeId(), jAtomPtr->typeId());
00113 
00114                   }
00115 
00116                }
00117 
00118             } // secondary atoms
00119 
00120          } // primary atoms
00121 
00122       } // cells
00123 
00124       accumulator_.sample(energy, outputFile_);
00125 
00126    }
00127 
00128    /*
00129    * Output results to file after simulation is completed.
00130    */
00131    void McPairEnergyAverage::output() 
00132    { 
00133       // If outputFile_ was used to write block averages, close it.
00134       if (accumulator_.nSamplePerBlock()) {
00135          outputFile_.close();
00136       }
00137 
00138       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".prm"), outputFile_);
00139       writeParam(outputFile_); 
00140       outputFile_.close();
00141 
00142       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".ave"), outputFile_);
00143       accumulator_.output(outputFile_); 
00144       outputFile_.close();
00145 
00146    }
00147    
00148    /*
00149    * Save state to binary file archive.
00150    */
00151    void McPairEnergyAverage::save(Serializable::OArchiveType& ar)
00152    { ar & *this; }
00153 
00154    /*
00155    * Load state from a binary file archive.
00156    */
00157    void McPairEnergyAverage::load(Serializable::IArchiveType& ar)
00158    { ar & *this; }
